# LT-GEE{-}

*Documentation by [Justin Braaten](https://github.com/jdbcode) of Oregon State University's [eMapR Lab](http://emapr.ceoas.oregonstate.edu/)*

*2018/06/08*

#### LandTrendr (Landsat-based detection of trends in disturbance and recovery) implementation on the Google Earth Engine platform {-}

<img src='imgs/lt_gee_symbols.png'>

*Please note that the provided example scripts are currently calling a non-public LT-GEE function, which is inaccessible without proper permission, so the scripts will fail if you try them now. Once the algorithm is publicly released you should have success.*
